alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued July 02 at 2:53PM EDT until July 04 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EDT MONDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline for the tonight and Monday night high tide cycle. * WHERE...Southern Fairfield County. * WHEN...For the first Coastal Flood Statement, from 10 PM this evening to 1 AM EDT Monday. For the second Coastal Flood Statement, from Monday evening through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional rounds of brief minor flooding are possible with the evening high tide cycle through midweek.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
